constituent: lament, Freud, state of mind, eminent, magic wand, augury, sun, day, ten, needle
heisigStory: To keep this character distinct from others of similar connotation, one need only think of the Prophet Jeremiah whose poetry gave an eminence to the state of mind we call lamentation.
koohiiStory1: When the world´s most eminent magician died, everyone´s state of mind became that of lamentation. He was buried with his famous sun-flower wand in his hand.
koohiiStory2: Data laments that he could never see his eminent father, his creator, ever again. He paints a picture of his father, that looks like a sunflower in the shape of a magic wand.
myStory: chữ Điệu. viếng. tiếc nuối. tiếc thương. tâm trạng của người lãnh đạo. truy điệu
